TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDigitalSignature extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a digital signature for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用而不是当你处理[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。Use instead of when you work with an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-注意，不能保证中的所有部件和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]完全签名文档。 is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-aware, and does not guarantee that all parts in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document are fully signed. 有关数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 文章*开放打包约定的数字签名框架*网址[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

related.span: 开放式打包约定 (OPC) 规范

span.span: Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) Specification

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示更改文档的属性是否会使数字签名无效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether changing the properties of the document invalidates the digital signature.

value.span: 如果更改文档的属性会使签名无效，则为 ；否则为 。

public: property Nullable<Guid> Id { Nullable<Guid> get(); };

summary.span: 获取签名的全局唯一标识符 (GUID)。

span.span: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) of the signature.
The GUID of the signature.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来显示和更新签名信息。The following example shows how to use the property to display and update signature information. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateSignatureDefinitions](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDefinitionsAndSigning.cs#iteratesignaturedefinitions)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#IterateSignatureDefinitions](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedefinitionsandsigning.vb#iteratesignaturedefinitions)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCertificateAvailable As Boolean
public: property bool IsCertificateAvailable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示签名者的 X.509 证书是否包含在文档 中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the signer's X.509 certificate is contained in the document .

value.span: 如果在文档中嵌入签名者的 X.509 证书; 否则为。

span.span: if the X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded in the document ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 签名者的 X.509 证书嵌入由方法调用时`embedCertificate`参数设置为`true`。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`. 有关数字签名和证书的详细信息，请参阅部分 3.3 中的数字签名*开放打包约定*规范可在下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignatureOriginRestricted As Boolean
public: property bool SignatureOriginRestricted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示其他人对包签名是否会使数字签名无效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the digital signature is invalidated if someone else signs the package.

value.span: 如果应用其他数字签名会使该签名无效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the signature is invalidated if an additional digital signature is applied; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 签名源限制设置方法调用时`restrictions`参数设置为排除一部分。The signature origin restriction is set by the method when called with the `restrictions` parameter set to exclude the part. 如果文档是由多个用户，签名需要首先签名文档时从签名中排除部分。If a document is to be signed by more than one person, the part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed. (排除项中指定`restrictions`到调用参数。)如果不排除部件，任何附加签名失效的第一个签名者签名。(Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to .) If the part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer. 核心属性和签名源部件的详细信息，请参阅第 3 章*开放打包约定*规范可在下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerCertificate As X509Certificate

summary.span: 获取签名程序的 X.509 证书。

span.span: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.

value.span: X.509 证书的签名者;或时没有文档包中嵌入证书。

span.span: The X.509 certificate of the signer; or when there is no certificate embedded in the document package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 签名者的 X.509 证书嵌入由方法调用时`embedCertificate`参数设置为`true`。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`. 有关数字签名和证书的详细信息，请参阅部分 3.3 中的数字签名*开放打包约定*规范可在下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SigningTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime SigningTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取创建签名的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time when the signature was created.

value.span: 对页、文档或文档序列签名的日期和时间。

span.span: The date and time when the pages, document, or document sequence was signed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于位置的签名发生在计算机的系统时间。 is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place. 不是"安全时间戳"，并不是来自受信任的时间戳颁发机构。 is not a "secure Time Stamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority. 必须获取并通过受信任的时间戳颁发机构应用安全时间戳。A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify() cil managed

summary.span: 根据 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 中嵌入的 X.509 证书验证文档的数字签名。

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] .

returns.span: 指定验证尝试结果的 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法验证文档数字签名所根据的嵌入的 X.509 证书方法调用时`embedCertificate`参数设置为`true`。This overload method verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult Verify(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Function Verify (certificate As X509Certificate) As VerifyResult

span.span: The certificate of authenticity for the signer.

summary.span: 根据指定 X.509 证书验证文档数字签名。

span.span: Verifies the document digital signature against a specified X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 指定验证尝试结果的 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

Verifies an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate() cil managed

summary.span: 验证包中嵌入的 X.509 证书。

span.span: Verifies the X.509 certificate embedded in the package.

returns.span: 枚举值的按位组合，这些枚举值指定验证尝试的结果。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序将需要决定哪些标志用于验证证书至关重要。Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates. 某些证书验证可能需要 Internet 连接。Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity. 签名者的 X.509 证书嵌入由方法调用时`embedCertificate`参数设置为`true`。The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.

related.span: 开放打包约定的数字签名框架

span.span: Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainStatusFlags VerifyCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate certificate) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyCertificate (certificate As X509Certificate) As X509ChainStatusFlags

span.span: A certificate of authenticity.

summary.span: 验证指定的 X.509 证书。

span.span: Verifies the specified X.509 certificate.

returns.span: 枚举值的按位组合，这些枚举值指定验证尝试的结果。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序将需要决定哪些标志用于验证证书至关重要。Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates. 某些证书验证可能需要 Internet 连接。Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
